name: Blockbuster FMV
description:
Live like it's the 90's in this FMV style point and click walkthrough experience of Blockbuster! Tour around Blockbuster and feel some nostalgia for FREE! I made this for fun as a quick coding exercise. I am happy to make any changes or updates.

Check out my physical games here : www.TheRetroRoomGames.com

Contact me here: JohnRoo@TheRetroRoomGames.com

Thanks to Nick P Was Here for the video! Go check out his channel!
